item.title: Remove vertical spacing around inline-block LI (list items)
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: I struggled with a minor issue in HTML for a few hours off an on during a project that was just really bothering me. Basically, I had a few LIs that I was displaying as inline-block (horizontally stacked side by side): [sourcecode lang=”html”] Item 1 Item 1 Item 1 [/sourcecode] When the rows would naturally wrap, there was a tiny gap between rows (as if there was a top margin or padding).
